eventDescription: User completes the demo walkthrough slides by viewing all steps and clicking 'Get Started'
User switches to a different organisation, which scopes the assistant to that organisation's data
User creates a new conversation with the AI assistant (important for measuring engagement)
User sends a message to the AI assistant (key engagement metric)
Assistant response is successfully received and completed (measures successful interactions)
An error occurred while fetching the assistant response (important for error tracking)
User clicks the 'New Thread' button to start a fresh conversation
User clicks a suggested action/prompt to start a conversation
User selects a different database table to view in the semantic model viewer
User opens the info/help modal to view the demo walkthrough again
A chart response is rendered in the assistant conversation (measures AI output types)
A table response is rendered in the assistant conversation (measures AI output types)
